english.segment1: vs1. Words will ride upon the wind. Like the leaves dance in the fall. Forever gone and back again. There can be no greater call
english.segment2: ch. Take the time, think it through. Walk in wise but leave a fool. And it can betray. Sometimes a beggar has more to say
english.segment3: vs2. An angel sang with her sweet voice. A siren song from heaven. To entice a man who had no choice. For he too was fallen
